verses.roman:
tataḥ sa kārayām āsa
kriyā bandhor hatasya vai
sākaṁ suhṛdbhir bhagavān
yā yāḥ syuḥ sāmparāyikīḥ

synonyms: tataḥ—then; saḥ—He, Lord Kṛṣṇa; kārayām āsa—had done; kriyā—the ritual duties; bandhoḥ—for His relative (Satrājit); hatasya—killed; vai—indeed; sākam—together with; suhṛdbhiḥ—well-wishers; bhagavān—the Supreme Lord; yāḥ yāḥ—all which; syuḥ—there are; sāmparāyikīḥ—for the time of one's departure from this world.
translation: Lord Kṛṣṇa then had the various funeral rites performed for His deceased relative, Satrājit. The Lord attended the funeral along with well-wishers of the family.
